name: Zombs Down
description:
DESCRIPTION
Survival zombie themed shooter game placed in the city of Madrid.

CONTROLS
- "a, s, d, w" or arrow keys for movement.
- Left click for shooting.
- You must be aware of your health, hunger and ammunition in order to survive.

CREDITS
This is a project made by students for the joy and knowledge about making better games.
- CEO & Programmer: Diego C. Torguet. (@DiegoCTorguet)
- Producer & Level Designer: Antonio Bastos Córdoba. (@antonio10bc)
- Artist: Juan María Sánchez Mel.
- Artist: Luis Daniel Reyes.
- Logo: Sergio Santos.
- Arrangements: Manuel Rodríguez Matesanz. (@Manuxd789)

We used:
"Dreams Become Real", "Finding the Balance", "Ossuary 4 - Animate", "Ossuary 6 - Air"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
